body.p: The font-variant-alternates CSS property controls the usage of alternate glyphs instead of the default ones.Currently supports only the styleset() function for font-variant-alternates.

section.title: Stylesets
section.p: The styleset() function defines a stylistic alternative for sets of characters. The parameter is a font-specific name mapped to a number. It corresponds to the OpenType value ssXY, like ss02.
